words.source: H853 ʾet, direct object marker + waw conjunction; untranslated in English
H4294 matteh, noun ms + article he; KJV 'this rod', ESV 'this staff', NASB 'this staff' — DIVERGENT: KJV 'rod' vs ESV/NASB 'staff'
H2088 zeh, demonstrative pronoun ms + article he; KJV/ESV/NASB 'this'
H3947 laqach, Qal yiqtol 2ms; KJV 'thou shalt take', ESV 'you shall take', NASB 'you shall take'
H3027 yad, noun fs + preposition be + 2ms suffix; KJV 'in thine hand', ESV/NASB 'in your hand'
H834 ʾasher, relative particle; KJV 'wherewith', ESV 'with which', NASB 'with which'
H6213 ʿasah, Qal yiqtol 2ms; KJV 'thou shalt do', ESV 'you shall do', NASB 'you shall perform'
Preposition be + 3ms suffix; KJV/ESV/NASB 'with it' (implied in relative clause)
H853 ʾet, direct object marker; untranslated in English
H226 ʾot, noun fp + article he; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the signs'
